page.title: 16Arncliffe Sports Centre
page.content: Arncliffe{Sports Centre}is in Arncliffe Road. It is open every day. There is a man who comes every Friday, Saturday and Sunday; his name is John. You have to be between 18 and 60 and you get a Membership Card which is yellow and has a plasic cover. I like the Arncliffe because my Dad owns it. He takes the{Gymnastics, Keep Fit}and he is also a D.J. The Centre has won 16 trophies for{football, netball, {cricket and bowls.}Sometimes the Majorettes{dance}there. A Gymnastics Display is planned for 24th August. JOHN HENAGHAN (9)
